title.heading: The Divine Gift
title.subheading: God has given us His Spirit so that we can experience intimacy with Him and enjoy all that He has for us.
title.peekpanel: The Holy Spirit is the source of our deepest satisfaction.

panel.text: Jesus said, "I will ask the Father, and he will give you another Counselor to be with you forever - the Spirit of truth. (John 14:16, 17)
"We have not received the spirit of the world but the Spirit who is from God, that we may understand what God has freely given us." (1 Corinthians 2:12)
...and experience all God has given us.
- A genuine new spiritual life (John 3:1-8) - The assurance of being a child of God (Romans 8:15, 16) - The infinite love of God (Romans 5:5; Ephesians 3:18,19)

The man without the Spirit does not accept the things of the Spirit of God, for they are foolishness to him, and he cannot understand them, because they are spiritually discerned. (1 Corinthians 2:14)
The spiritual man makes judgements about all thingsâ€¦we have the mind of Christ. (1 Corinthians 2:15,16)
But those who are controlled by the Holy Spirit think about things that please the Spirit. (Romans 8:5, NLT)

page.question: Why are so many Christians not satisfied in their experience with God?
